name: Newton's Apple
description:
Newton's Apple:

Actions: Players use the ⬅️ ➡️ on the keyboard to control 🍎 to move left and right. Rules:

  • 🍎 Can only move left and right.
  • If 🍎 touches the top of the game interface/does not fall on 🟩, if it falls out of the bottom of the game interface, the game will fail. You need to click the "restart" button to restart the game.
  • 🍎Every time you drop one layer successfully, the score in the upper left corner will increase by 1.

Goals: Get a higher score. 

Objects: Background, apple, green board, "restart" button, scoring text.
